1117120.name: The Cross Horror Game
1117120.description:
The Cross is the most interesting First Person survivor ( FPS ) horror game with Stunning graphics and extraordinary atmosphere.

The game follows zak as he searches for his missing daughter lilly and his wife after accident in the s.street Florida. Now you are trapped in haunted house infested with ghost zombies and other monsters


The Powerful Unreal Enigne 4 Create Amazing 3D High End Graphics with Interesting Game Play and Stunning Haunted Horror Atmosphere.


FEATURES

» Amazing 3D High End Graphics
» Interesting Game Play
» Stunning Haunted Horror Atmosphere
» Challenging puzzles
» Plug in your headphones for the best
» Spatial 3D Sound
» Weapons
» Paranormal activity
» Supports external controller
» Inventory managment
» Map system
» Books
» Save system
» Smooth and intuitive controls

The Cross is a paranormal survivor horror and creepy game

Enjoy playing.
1117120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
